faq-sil-VBPVBU86.q: When can Silverarrow’s Gold Fast Travel?
faq-sil-VBPVBU86.a:
The Fast Travel has all the normal restrictions of a Fast Travel action: there must be no enemy units in her Zone. If those conditions are met, she can move to anywhere in an adjacent Zone that has no enemy units.
_Note that this is a rare instance of a Fast Travel which is not replacing a movement action. Silverarrow could Fast Travel (if valid), even if she cannot move due to another effect._

faq-sil-BNCeD4CM.q: Does Silverarrow’s Primary Blue (Grasping Roots) affect a Hero who moves in range of Silverarrow during their movement?
faq-sil-BNCeD4CM.a: No, movement restrictions are checked at the beginning of the movement.

faq-sil-itYXMsuM.q: Can Silverarrow's silver allow her to fast-travel through obstacles (and travel move from beach to jungle on the single-lane map)?
faq-sil-itYXMsuM.a: No, ignoring obstacles has no effect on zone adjacency. Additionally, you may ignore obstacles during your movement, but fast travel is a special action that **replaces** movement.
